description: Asynchronously deletes one or more documents added using the BatchPutDocument API from an Amazon Q Business index. You can see the progress of the deletion, and any error messages related to the process, by using CloudWatch.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business index that contains the documents to delete.

parameters.name: documents
parameters.description: Documents deleted from the Amazon Q Business index. (dict) --- A document deleted from an Amazon Q Business data source connector. The identifier of the deleted document.

nested_params.name: documentId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the deleted document.

nested_items.name: failedDocuments
nested_items.description: A list of documents that couldn't be removed from the Amazon Q Business index. Each entry contains an error message that indicates why the document couldn't be removed from the index.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document that couldn't be removed from the Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business data source connector that contains the failed document.
